definition: benefit resulting from some event or action, to give an advantage to
details:
noun
- benefit resulting from some event or action
= example: benefit resulting from some event or action
= synonyms: reward
- the quality of having a superior or more favorable position
= example: the quality of having a superior or more favorable position
= synonyms: vantage
- (tennis) first point scored after deuce
verb
- to give an advantage to
= example: to give an advantage to
